Class Project<T>

java.lang.Object
BTO.Project<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of item this project manages
public class Project<T> extends Object
A generic container class that manages collections of entities within the BTO system. This class acts as a lightweight project-level storage for any type of item, such as Users, Applications, Enquiries, or BTOs. It supports basic operations including: adding items, removing items, and retrieving the full list. It is used throughout the system to hold user lists, project data, and other core records.
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin

    • getAppByBTO

      public List<Application> getAppByBTO(int btoId, String type, String status)
      Retrieves applications filtered by BTO ID, type, and optional status.
      Parameters:
      btoId - the BTO project ID
      type - the application type ("bto" or "officer")
      status - optional status filter (e.g., "pending", "booked"); pass null for no filter
      Returns:
      a list of matching Applications

    • getAppByUser

      Parameters:
      userId - the applicant user ID
      type - the application type
      Returns:
      a list of applications submitted by the user
